```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
library(oceandatr)
```

```{r package-load}
devtools::load_all()
```

```{r}
kosrae_12nm <- get_area(area_name = "Micronesia", query_type = "eez_12nm", mregions_column = "sovereign1") %>% 
  sf::st_crop(xmin = 162.6, ymin = 5, xmax = 163.3, ymax = 5.6)

plot(kosrae_12nm[2])
```

```{r}
enviro_data <- get_enviro_regions(area_polygon = kosrae_12nm, raw_data = TRUE)

terra::plot(enviro_data, fun = function()terra::lines(terra::vect(kosrae_12nm)))
```
